com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.model.util

Class AbstractLocalizationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.model.util.AbstractLocalizationContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalizationContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChildLocalizationContext, DefaultLocalizationContext

    public abstract class AbstractLocalizationContext
extends Object
implements LocalizationContext
    Abstract base class for localication context implementations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractLocalizationContext

        protected AbstractLocalizationContext(Locale locale,
                                      String keyPrefix)
        Creates an abstract localization context with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale
        keyPrefix - the key prefix of the context, which can be used for property namespacing
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the locale or key prefix is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the key prefix starts or ends with a period

    • Method Detail

      • buildKey

        protected static String buildKey(String... keyComponents)
        Builds a localization key from the specified key components. Individual components may not be null, but may be empty. The may not start or end with a period, but may have embedded period. The resulting key will be formed by concatenating all the nonempty components, separated by periods.
        Parameters:
        keyComponents - the key components
        Returns:
        the derived localization key
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any key component is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if any key component starts or ends with a period
